column1: '''MinasTirith.com''' was founded on May 21, 2000, making it one of the oldest [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: Tolkien]] communities. The website is known for their scholarly discussions and tight-knit community. 'MT' was founded by White Gold Wielder (WGW) and is unique in the sense that he is still the only moderator.
